# Learn about API authentication here: https://plot.ly/ggplot2/getting-started # Find your api_key here: https://plot.ly/settings/api library(plotly) library(reshape2) # for melt em <- melt(economics, id = "date") qplot(date, value, data = em, geom = "line", group = variable) + facet_grid(variable ~ ., scale = "free_y") + theme_bw() ggplotly()
